Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Research Assistant, European University Institute Programmazione in Matlab e Gauss codes per diversi progetti in applied macroeconomics.
Intern al dipartimento di Ricerca della Deutsche Bundesbank Lavoro su un nuovo modello MIDAS, l' Unrestricted-MIDAS

Refereeing per: Econometric Theory, Econometrics and Statistics, Empirical Economics, International Journal of Computational Economics and Econometrics, International Journal of Forecasting, Journal of Applied Econometrics, Journal of Business Cycle Analysis and Measurement, Journal of Econometrics, Journal of Forecasting, Journal of the Royal Statistical Society, Oxford Bulletin of Economics and Statistics.

Researcher, Norges Bank Ricerca con focus principalmente su forecasting e analisi strutturale di sviluppi macroeconomici. Membro del team di short-term forecasting, responsabile delle previsioni di GDP e inflazione per la Norvegia. Membro del team per lo sviluppo di cross-checks models per le variabili rilevanti per la politica monetaria norvegese.

Economist, European Central Bank (on leave da Norges Bank) Responsabile dei modelli di previsione e di analisi strutturale del prezzo del perolio. Ricerca sulla relazione tra prezzo del petrolio e degli asset prices e su cambiamenti strutturali nel mercato del petrolio. Ricerca su incertezza, tassi di cambio, identificazione degli shock.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Conferenze: 2016: Annual Conference of the International Association for Applied Econometrics, CAMP-BI Workshop on Commodities, business cycles and monetary policy, 1st Banque de France – Norges Bank Workshop in Empirical Macroeconomics (discussant), 3rd Bundesbank – Norges Bank Workshop, Workshop in Forecasting in Finance and Macroeconomics – University of Bolzano (discussant); 2015: Symposium of the Society for Nonlinear Dynamics and Econometrics, SIRE Workshop, Barcelona GSE Summer Forum, Euro Area Business Cycle Network Conference, Annual Conference of the International Association for Applied Econometrics; 2014: Forskermøtet, Macroeconomic and Econometric Conference, Birmingham, Computing in Economics and Finance, Annual Conference of the International Association for Applied Econometrics, International Symposium on Forecasting, Conference on Computational Financial Econometrics, (EC)2 Conference; 2013: Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Symposium of the Society for Nonlinear Dynamics and Econometrics, Royal Economic Society, Canadian Economics Association Annual Conference, (EC)2 Conference; 2012: RES PhD Meeting; 2011: (EC)2 Conference.

Seminari (su invito): 2016: Banque de France, Deutsche Bundesbank; 2015: European Central Bank, Bank of England; 2014: BI Norwegian Business School; 2013: St. Andrews University; 2012: Norges Bank, Hungarian Central Bank, De Nederlandsche Bank, Statistics Norway.
Co-organizzatore della serie di seminari a Norges Bank
